name: Cryptographer
ability: Each day, guess what the setup modification is: if right, learn the Demon. [???]

jinxes.reason: If the Cryptographer is not-in-play & the Philosopher chooses Cryptographer, they are drunk.

name: Chemist
ability: You have a fusion of 2 in-play characters' abilities. Each day. privately guess which: if right, learn your ability.
firstNightReminder: Mark 2 players with the *SYNTHESISED* reminders and then decide on the Chemist's ability based on which characters are marked. If appropriate, run the ability tonight.

name: Insurrectionist
ability: Once per game, choose a player: if good, they become & learn your character. If evil guesses you (once), your team loses.
firstNightReminder: The Insurrectionist might choose a player. That player, if good, becomes an Insurrectionist & learns who recruited them. The recruiter loses their ability. :reminder:
otherNightReminder: The Insurrectionist might choose a player. That player, if good, becomes an Insurrectionist & learns who recruited them. The recruiter loses their ability. :reminder:

name: Conspiracist
ability: 1 Townsfolk receives reversed info & it moves to a Townsfolk neighbour each night, even if you die. Each night, learn which direction.
firstNightReminder: The *REVERSED INFO* :reminder: moves to 1 of the current holder's Townsfolk neighbours. *If the Conspiracist is alive*, wake them & show which direction.
otherNightReminder: The *REVERSED INFO* :reminder: moves to 1 of the current holder's Townsfolk neighbours. *If the Conspiracist is alive*, wake them & show which direction.

name: Earthmover
otherNightReminder: If there are players marked *DOOMED*: Those players *die* no matter what. :reminder: :reminder:
ability: Once per game, before nominations, publicly choose 2 players: they die tonight (even if for some reason they couldn't).

name: Veraxillus
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You might have the abilities of characters you're mad you are: if so, learn this.
otherNightReminder: The Veraxillus chooses a player, who *dies*. The Veraxillus might have another ability on top of this; if so, run it at the appropriate time.

name: Muras
ability: Each night, choose 3 players: if any nominate tomorrow, they die that night. If none do, all die.
otherNightReminder: Players marked *NOMINATED* die. :reminder: If no-one is, players marked *BLEEDING* die. :reminder: The Muras chooses 3 players. :reminder:

name: Fluxicon
ability: Each night*, choose up to the number of alive evils: that many players die tonight.
otherNightReminder: The Fluxicon signals a number up to the amount of evil players alive. That many players *die*. :reminder:

name: Cataclysm
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. For each failed nomination by good today, or if none nominated, choose 1 more.
otherNightReminder: The Cataclysm chooses 1 player, plus another for each failed nomination by good today. If the Cataclysm is marked *NO GOOD NOMINATED*, they choose 2. They *die*. :reminder:

name: Absolut
ability: Townsfolk abilities yield false info except 1. Each evil may (once) publicly guess who: if right, or after day 5, evil wins.

jinxes.reason: If Absolut is in play, the Miasma reverses information instead of making it false.
If Absolut is in play, the Vortox reverses information instead of making it false.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
If Absolut is in play, Each night*, the Tactician instead learns which of their choices would benefit evil the most by sharing their information.
If Absolut is in play, the Spy does not see any reminder tokens in the Grimoire.
If Absolut is in play, the Widow does not see any reminder tokens in the Grimoire.
If Absolut is in play, the Esper does not see any reminder tokens in the Grimoire.

firstNightReminder: Mark 1 Townsfolk as the *THOUGHT CRIMINAL*. :reminder: All other Townsfolk yield false info.

name: Hysteria
ability: On day 3, the living may duel (all learns this): both learn a question & whoever fails to answer correctly 1st dies. After day 2, evil wins.
otherNightReminder: If it is dawn on day 3, announce that *Hysteria has broken out!*

jinxes.reason: If the Moonflower dies & the next player to die duelling against a good player is good, the Moonflower's team loses.
If the Ravenkeeper dies during a duel without answering, they may visit the Storyteller to use their ability.
If the Farmer dies during a duel without answering, an alive good player becomes a Farmer & is told this by the Storyteller.
If the Sage dies during a duel without answering, they may visit the Storyteller to learn that the Demon is 1 of 2 players.
If the Banshee dies during a duel without answering, their ability activates immediately.
If the Steeplejack dies during a duel without answering, they may visit the Storyteller to use their ability.
If a player the Lumberjack sees dies during a duel, the Lumberjack may visit the Storyteller to use their ability.
If the Soldier dies dueling the Hysteria, they don't. If they die otherwise, they do.
If a player chosen by the Monk last night dies dueling the Hysteria, they don't.
If a player chosen by the Innkeeper last night dies dueling the Hysteria, they don't.
If a player chosen by the Devil's Advocate dies during a duel, they don't, but no longer survive execution.
The Fencer learns that Hysteria is in play 1 day earlier.
Players who die by duels register as being executed to the Pacifist.
Each night*, the Tactician instead learns which of their choices would be better for evil to duel on the final day.

name: Biologist
ability: Each night, choose 2 players: learn 1 of their characters. If either are drunk or poisoned, learn false info.
otherNightReminder: The Biologist chooses 2 players.

name: Cavalry
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if Cavalry dies tonight, they are drunk until dusk tomorrow, even if you dies. [+0 to +2 Cavalry]
otherNightReminder: Cavalry all choose a player. If a Cavalry dies tonight, the players chosen by living Cavalry are drunk for the next night, day and following night. :reminder:

name: Fact Checker
ability: Each day, players may make 1 public statement: each night*, learn how many were true. If you would learn 0, you're drunk tonight.
otherNightReminder: Show a finger signal equalling the number of *CORRECT* reminder tokens on the Grimoire, or any number if there are none. Remove all *CORRECT* reminder tokens.

name: Gunsmith
ability: For every 2 players you execute, choose a player that night: if both executees were good, they die.
otherNightReminder: If there are 2 *EXECUTED* reminders: wake the Gunsmith. They choose a player. If both players marked *EXECUTED* are good, that player *dies*. :reminder: Remove the *EXECUTED* reminders.

name: Bar Fighter
ability: Each night*, if you would be drunk or poisoned, you aren't & a living Townsfolk neighbour dies.
otherNightReminder: If the Bar Fighter is drunk or poisoned: they become sober & healthy, and a living Townsfolk neighbour *dies*. :reminder:

name: Mindwarp
ability: Each night, learn a statement: if you're not mad it's false tomorrow, the Demon learns it & may choose if it is true or false.
otherNightReminder: If the Mindwarp was not sufficiently mad: Wake the Demon, show them *THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU* and the Mindwarp token, then the statement. The Demon gives a thumb signal or shakes their head. Modify the game corresponding to the given signal. Show the Mindwarp a statement.

firstNightReminder: The Manipulator chooses a player: they are poisoned. The Manipulator has their ability.
otherNightReminder: If the poisoned player died today or tonight: The Manipulator chooses a player: they are poisoned. The Manipulator has their ability.
name: Chessmaster
ability: You start by choosing a player to poison: you know & have their ability. If they die, choose again.

jinxes.reason: If the Chessmaster dies while poisoning the Damsel, the Damsel remains poisoned.

name: Signal Jammer
ability: Nominators are secret. Executees may guess their nominator: if right, they're executed instead.

name: Excelsus
ability: Each night*, choose any amount of characters: learn how many are in-play. If all are, all die.
otherNightReminder: The Excelsus chooses any amount of characters. Show a finger signal of how many are in play. If all are, those characters *die*. :reminder:

name: Vitoo
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you nominate a Minion & they live, swap characters tonight.
otherNightReminder: If a Minion is marked *SWAPS TONIGHT* and is alive: they and the Vitoo swap characters. The Vitoo chooses a player. :reminder:

name: Chronomancer
ability: The 1st time the Demon dies, they live but register as dead (they wake every other night), but all learn this when you die.

firstNightReminder: Wake the Hypnotist. Show them the Grimoire for as long as they need. They point at a player & character. :reminder: Put them to sleep, wake that player and make them think something about that character. Then, wake the Hypnotist and tell them what they were told (if applicable).
otherNightReminder: Wake the Hypnotist. Show them the Grimoire for as long as they need. They point at a player & character. :reminder: Put them to sleep, wake that player and make them think something about that character. Then, wake the Hypnotist and tell them what they were told (if applicable).
name: Hypnotist
ability: Each night, see the Grimoire then choose a player & character: they think something about that character (you know what).

name: Quaesitor
ability: You start knowing 5 characters: if none live, evil wins at dusk (all learn this). Each night*, choose a player: they die.
firstNightReminder: The Quaesitor learns 5 characters. Mark the in-play ones as *MARK*s. :reminder:
otherNightReminder: The Quaesitor chooses a player: they die. :reminder: If no players marked *MARK* are alive, mark the Quaesitor with *MIDNIGHT*. :reminder: Tomorrow, all players learn this & will have 1 day to execute the Quaesitor.

name: Doomsday Clock
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If no Minions live, evil wins at dusk (all learn this). [+1 good Minion]
otherNightReminder: The Doomsday Clock chooses a player: they die. :reminder: If no Minions live, mark the Doomsday Clock with *Midnight*. :reminder: Tomorrow, all players learn this & will have 1 day to execute the Doomsday Clock.

jinxes.reason: If a good Minion makes an incorrect Damsel guess, it won't count.
A good Hypnotist does not see the Grimoire.

name: Bio-Weapon
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Evil & poisoned players poison their good nominees. If all alive good are poisoned, evil wins at dusk (all learn this).
otherNightReminder: The Bio-Weapon chooses a player: they die. :reminder: If all alive players except the Bio-Weapon are poisoned, mark the Bio-Weapon with *Midnight*. :reminder: Tomorrow, all players learn this & will have 1 day to execute the Bio-Weapon.

name: Cessation
ability: After day 12, evil wins. For each nomination, the end comes 1 day sooner; for each Minion who dies by execution, it comes 2 later.
firstNightReminder: Mark Cessation with *ONCE* (12+ players) or *TWICE* (<11 players). :reminder: :reminder: Then, count <no. of players> steps anti-clockwise from Cessation and mark that player with *BEAT*. :reminder:
otherNightReminder: Move *BEAT* 1 step clockwise.

name: Infernoplex
ability: Each night, all players learn a question & must answer it correctly tomorrow or evil wins at dusk. After day 5, evil wins.
firstNightReminder: Mark Cessation with *ONCE* (12+ players) or *TWICE* (<11 players). :reminder: :reminder: Then, count <no. of players> steps anti-clockwise from Cessation and mark that player with *BEAT*. :reminder:
otherNightReminder: Move *BEAT* 1 step clockwise.
